title: Older yordles look gross :()
body: I think we can all agree that the older yordles in league right now look quite old and can use updates, Veigar{{champion:45}} , Rumble{{champion:68}} , Corki{{champion:42}} , Kennen{{champion:85}}, Lulu{{champion:117}}  . I know Most of the champions will eventually get a visual update to stay in line with the new champions, But I think it is about time to show our Yordles some love.

Oh. . . I thought you were talking about Old Yordles in a literal sense. . .

Now that you brought up the subject, I was thinking of giving {{champion:42}} an ability overhaul as well just so his kit would fit in to the whole Dog Fighting theme. When I think of dog fights, I think of planes trying to tail each other, firing their guns and missiles at their enemies. So perhaps some kind of passive or ability where Corki tails an opponent and fires all his guns at his opponent simultaneously.

That idea can be reserved for another dog fighting champion as well. Speaking of which, I'd like a new set of pilot champions who are all part of the Screaming Yipsnakes as a way to explore Corki's lore on his flight background. The many missions he's participated in, and some of his most daring and most dangerous battles. I mean Piltover as far as I can see is the only city with flying machines so its most likely Corki has fought against flying monsters throughout his career and is damn good at it too.
I love Lulu, but I wish they'd make her look more akin to Poppy and Tristana.

I kinda want yordels to live all over the place outside of piltover and make it the case that when yordels and humans coexist they start making science

i mean I'm stoned so that might be stupid af

Also he blows up a lot of vital infrastructure in his super hero antics but is still seen as a hero

The reason is simple: all of them are males. Males are yucky.
***
Even though what I said above is a joke, old male yordles do look more outdated (visually and thematically) than female yordles. Only Ziggs, Veigar and Fizz get a pass, imo. Some need an upgrade, at least to be in line with the rest.

Both Kennen and Corki are on the VGU list. Veigar is fine as is, because you can't see his face (part of his fantasy). I would even go so far as to say Teemo needs a VGU too, but Teemo is untouchable.


######I'm not considering Kled and Gnar as "older yordles".
